{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

				{

				}
			}
			else

				{

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;

		}

	}
	else 
	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				}

				}

		}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

		array[id] = value;
	}

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	}

		array[id] = value;
	}

			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;

		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

			{

				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

{

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

			{

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');

				}
			}
			else
			{

				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

			{

				}
			}

				}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;

   return 0;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	fclose(outputFile);

	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;

		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

			{

				idCheckSymbol++;

				{

					idCheckSymbol = 0;

				}
			}

			{

				{

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	fclose(outputFile);

		array[id] = value;
	}

	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				idCheckSymbol++;

				{

					idCheckSymbol = 0;

				}
			}
			else

				}

	}
	else 
	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}



// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}



// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

	}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				}

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	}

		return

	fclose(outputFile);

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	fclose(outputFile);

	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	fclose(outputFile);

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	fclose(outputFile);

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

#include "stdafx.h"

{

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check

		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;

		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

			{

					idCheckSymbol = 0;

				}
			}
			else
			{

				{

				}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

		return false;
	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				}
			}

	}

	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();

{

		return false;

	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;

	}
	return true;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

				}

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}

	}
	else 
	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

			{

				{

					idCheckSymbol = 0;

				}

				}

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

	{
		array[id] = value;
	}

		array[id] = value;
	}

	}

		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

#include "stdafx.h"

{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* outputFile;

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		{

			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;

				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{

				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);

				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))

			{

				idCheckSymbol++;

				}
			}

	}
	else 
	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

				}
			}

	}

	{
		return

	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

	fclose(outputFile);

		return false;

	return true;
}

{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{

	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";

	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{

		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.
//

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}


// Task1.cpp: îïðåäåëÿåò òî÷êó âõîäà äëÿ êîíñîëüíîãî ïðèëîæåíèÿ.

#include "stdafx.h"

static const unsigned int SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER = 255;

bool FileIsOpen(FILE **file , const FIXCHAR *nameFile , const FIXCHAR *mode)
{
	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(file , nameFile , mode);

	//assert(eInputFile == 0);// TODO : wiil do correct check
	if (eInputFile > 0)
	{
		std::cout << "File " << nameFile << " is not open!!!" << std::endl;
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

void resetArray(FIXCHAR* array, int size, FIXCHAR value)
{
	for (size_t id = 0; id < size; id++)
	{
		array[id] = value;
	}
}

int main(int argc , FIXCHAR *argv[])
{
	const FIXCHAR* nameInputFile = "input.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* nameOutputFile = "output.txt";
	const FIXCHAR* searchString = "123";
	const FIXCHAR* replaceString = "sdfxg";

	FILE* inputFile;
	FILE* outputFile;

	errno_t eInputFile = fopen_s(&inputFile , nameInputFile , "r");
	errno_t eOutputFile = fopen_s(&outputFile , nameOutputFile , "w");

	if ((eInputFile == 0)
			&& (eOutputFile == 0))
	{
		FIXCHAR currentChar;
		unsigned int idCheckSymbol = 0;
		unsigned int countÑoincidence = 0;

		FIXCHAR FIXCHARBuffer[SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER];
		resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER, '\0');

		while (!feof(inputFile))
		{
			currentChar = getc(inputFile);

			//std::cout << currentChar << std::endl;
			if (currentChar == searchString[idCheckSymbol])
			{
				FIXCHARBuffer[idCheckSymbol] = currentChar;
				idCheckSymbol++;
				if (idCheckSymbol == strlen(searchString))
				{
					countÑoincidence++;
					idCheckSymbol = 0;

					resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
					fputs(replaceString , outputFile);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (strlen(FIXCHARBuffer) > 0)
				{
					fputs(FIXCHARBuffer , outputFile);

				}
				fputc(currentChar , outputFile);
				


				resetArray(FIXCHARBuffer , SIZE_CHAR_BUFFER , '\0');
				idCheckSymbol = 0;
			}
		}
		std::cout << "Number coincidence = " << countÑoincidence << std::endl;

	}
	else 
	{
		return
	}

	fclose(inputFile);
	fclose(outputFile);

	std::cout << "Press any key for exit..." << std::endl;
	_getch();
   return 0;
}
